amendment.description: To provide for full consideration of tax cuts in the Senate under regular order.

vote.text: Amendment SA 207 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 59.

action.text: Amendment SA 207 proposed by Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S2817-2821; text: CR S2817) To provide for full consideration of tax cuts in the Senate under regular order.
